mapper.insert: insert into cart(cnum, pnum, category, id, name, count, price, discount, cartdate, image1) values(cart_seq.nextval, #{pnum}, #{category}, #{id}, #{dto.name}, #{count}, #{dto.price}, #{dto.discount}, sysdate ,#{dto.image1})
mapper.select: select cnum, pnum, category, id, name, count, price, discount, to_char(cartdate, 'YYYY-MM-dd') cartdate, image1 from cart where id=#{userid} order by cnum desc
select count(*) from cart where id=#{userid}
mapper.update: update cart set count=#{count} where cnum=#{cnum}
